about_the_game:
Add 244 Beddo no Tenshi Nekomimi to Hentai Senpai: Sukebe Nekomimi no Yoru!

Thats 244 new swapping/rotating puzzles with increasing difficulty to solve.
Be rewarded with an up close view of all 244 Nekomimi in the gallery!

Add these new sexy Nekomimi to your collection now with Beddo no Tenshi!

content_descriptors.notes: Hentai Senpai: Sukebe Nekomimi no Yoru - Beddo no Tenshi has graphic sexual content including nudity, sex, genitalia, bondage, sex toys, bodily fluids, tentacles & masturbation.
